Sentencas: A fabrication technology has been developed for a novel high-performance solid oxide fuel cells with honeycomb structure via the extrusion of a cathode-honeycomb monolith and subsequent channel surface coating with electrolyte/anode bilayers.
Titulo: A Slurry Injection Method for the Fabrication of Multiple Microchannel SOFCs

Sentencas: A novel coating technique for the preparation of dense electrolyte films on the channel surfaces in cathode honeycomb supports is reported.
Titulo: A Slurry Injection Method for the Fabrication of Multiple Microchannel SOFCs

Sentencas: When the dipping method is used, the high viscous resistance of the electrolyte slurry inhibited slurry penetration into the microchannels, which resulted in insufficient channel surface coating.
Titulo: A Slurry Injection Method for the Fabrication of Multiple Microchannel SOFCs

Sentencas: By contrast, the newly developed channel coating technique, i.e. the slurry injection method, allowed the slurry to be injected into the honeycomb channels without the formation of any coating defects.
Titulo: A Slurry Injection Method for the Fabrication of Multiple Microchannel SOFCs
